video.title: Ôran kôkô hosutobu
video.synopsis: New student Haruhi stumbles on the Ouran High School Host Club, an all-male group that makes money by entertaining the girls of the school.

episodes.synopsis: After Haruhi literally stumbles into the Ouran Host Club and breaks an expensive vase, the only way she can pay for the damage is to work as a host.
episodes.title: Starting Today, You Are a Host!

episodes.synopsis: With a formal party right around the corner, Tamaki masterminds a scheme to help Haruhi settle down with the right guy once and for all.
episodes.title: The Job of a High School Host!

episodes.synopsis: With Ouran Academy's physical exam threatening to expose Haruhi's secret, Tamaki is forced to use diversionary tactics.
episodes.title: Beware the Physical Exam!

episodes.synopsis: Renge, who's obsessed with dating sims, declares herself the club's new manager -- and her first order of business is to give each host a "dark side."
episodes.title: Attack of the Lady Manager!

episodes.synopsis: When Haruhi divulges the secret of how she can tell the difference between Hikaru and Kaoru, their sibling rivalry quickly spirals out of control.
episodes.title: The Twins Fight!

episodes.synopsis: When Tamaki takes an elementary school student as his apprentice, the kid's brutal honesty has everyone's heads spinning.
episodes.title: The Grade School Host is the Naughty Type!

episodes.synopsis: With Honey missing, the hosts' vacation turns into a search-and-rescue mission, replete with alligator attacks and a blitz by a private police force.
episodes.title: Jungle Pool SOS!

episodes.synopsis: While at the beach, the twins make a game of finding ways to scare Haruhi -- who proves as fearless as they come.
episodes.title: The Sun, the Sea and the Host Club!

episodes.synopsis: The Zuka Club drops in to check out the hosts -- and isn't impressed. In fact, Zuka has every intention of stealing Haruhi away from the boys.
episodes.title: A Challenge from Lobelia Girls' Academy!

episodes.synopsis: Tamaki and the boys check out Haruhi's apartment. It's a tight fit, but there's plenty of room for the kind of trouble that follows the hosts around.
episodes.title: A Day in the Life of the Fujioka Family!

episodes.synopsis: Nekozawa is sensitive to light and his kid sister is afraid of the dark. To bring them together, Renge sets out to turn Nekozawa into a dreamy prince.
episodes.title: Big Brother is a Prince!

episodes.synopsis: When Mori makes Honey go sugar-free after he gets a cavity, it doesn't take long for the littlest host to turn against his friend.
episodes.title: Honey's Three Bitter Days!

episodes.synopsis: Haruhi finds herself wandering through a weird version of Ouran Academy that can only be described as a wonderland -- with Tamaki as the Mad Hatter.
episodes.title: Haruhi in Wonderland!

episodes.synopsis: The newspaper club wants to run a story on the hosts in order to boost readership, but the editor's grudge against Tamaki could cause trouble.
episodes.title: Covering the Famous Host Club!

episodes.synopsis: The boys visit the bed and breakfast where Haruhi works part-time, but only the host who can charm Haruhi's boss will win a good night's sleep.
episodes.title: The Refreshing Battle in Karuizawa!

episodes.synopsis: To teach his twin about relationships, Kaoru sends Hikaru and Haruhi on a date. Can Hikaru show that he's capable of being thoughtful of others?
episodes.title: Operation Haruhi and Hikaru's First Date!

episodes.synopsis: Kyoya finds himself spending a day at a department store with Haruhi, but he's in a bad mood and completely out of his element.
episodes.title: Kyoya's Reluctant Day Out!

episodes.synopsis: Honey's decision to abandon martial arts and pursue a life of luxury has his intense younger brother seething with rage.
episodes.title: Chika's 'Down with Honey' Declaration!

episodes.synopsis: The hosts take action to rescue Haruhi after Benio manipulates her into taking the lead role in Lobelia's extravagant musical production.
episodes.title: Lobelia Girls' Academy Strikes Back!

episodes.synopsis: When Tamaki asks Hikaru and Kaoru to be inaugural members of the host club, they show him just how difficult they can be.
episodes.title: The Door the Twins Opened!

episodes.synopsis: Haruhi's classmates hold a Halloween competition to find out who can be the scariest, but the fear in Kaoru's heart has nothing to do with ghosts.
episodes.title: Until the Day it Becomes a Pumpkin!

episodes.synopsis: After some time with the hosts, bad boy Kasanoda starts looking at things differently -- and he's looking at Haruhi in a whole new way, too.
episodes.title: Mori-senpai Has an Apprentice Candidate!

episodes.synopsis: Now that Kasanoda's hooked on Haruhi, his constant presence in the music room is stirring some troubling emotions in the hearts of a few hosts.
episodes.title: Tamaki's Unwitting Depression!

episodes.synopsis: Once intense rivals, Tamaki and Kyoya have built a solid -- if unlikely -- friendship by utilizing each other's strengths.
episodes.title: And so Kyoya Met Him!

episodes.synopsis: Tamaki's family brings a guest, Éclair, to the school festival -- and she's got designs on the king.
episodes.title: The Host Club Declares Dissolution!

episodes.synopsis: The only way to save the host club is to keep Tamaki from returning to France with Éclair.
episodes.title: This is Our Ouran Fair!
